messages.title: Fighting against Hard Brexit
messages.content: Liberal Democrats are the only party that has always fought for Britain's membership of the European Union, and that's why we are fighting for you to have your say on the final Brexit deal.

messages.title: Standing up for the NHS
messages.content: Only the Liberal Democrats would give the NHS the funds it needs by raising a penny on income tax to provide an additional £6 billion for health and care services.

messages.title: Opposing school cuts
messages.content: Local schools are under threat from a Conservative Party that has stopped listening to local people in Braintree. Schools in Essex are set to lose nearly £78 million from their budgets.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Liberal Democrats are the only party that has always fought for Britain's membership of the European Union, and that's why we are fighting for you to have your say on the final Brexit deal.
Only the Liberal Democrats would give the NHS the funds it needs by raising a penny on income tax to provide an additional £6 billion for health and care services.
Local schools are under threat from a Conservative Party that has stopped listening to local people in Braintree. Schools in Essex are set to lose nearly £78 million from their budgets.

contactInformation.address: Liberal Democrats, both at 54 Gyms Dyke Way, Stanway, Colchester CO3 0QT. Printed by Printec Europe Ltd, 70 Upper Chase, Chelmsford, CM2 0BN.
